official_title: An Open Label, Multi-centre, Phase I/II Dose Escalation Trial of a Recombinant Adeno-associated Virus Vector (AAV2/5-hRKp.RPGR) for Gene Therapy of Adults and Children With X-linked Retinitis Pigmentosa Owing to Defects in Retinitis Pigmentosa GTPase Regulator (RPGR)
inclusion_criteria:
Key inclusion Criteria:

* Males aged 5 years or older
* Have X-linked retinitis pigmentosa confirmed by a retinal specialist (CI or PI)

Key exclusion Criteria:

â€¢ Have participated in another research study involving an investigational medicinal therapy for ocular disease within the last 6 months
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 5 Years
